title: Thiruttu Paya Pulla Lyrics Thagararu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Thiruttu Paya Pulla
Singer(s): Karthik
Music: Dharan Kumar
Movie: Thagararu

Thiruttu Paya Pulla, Thiruttu Paya Pulla
morattu idhayatha nee odachitiye odachitiye

Usura tholachiten, ulukki eduthitta
sundum vizhiyaala iluthitiye, iluthitiye
I am, I luv you,
you luv me sollu
thavikureney, thudikkureney
dhinam kudichi polamburen
i am so happy, you happy tell-u
valiyureney, kolayureney, kanavellaam medhakuren

Thiruttu Paya Pulla, Thiruttu Paya Pulla
morattu idhayatha nee odachitiye odachitiye

Dhinam dhinam irakkuren
thirumbavum porakkuren
heart-ellam odharudhu
dhinam kaalayum maalayum
kadhal kolludhey

Thavikuren, thudikuren, nenaikuren
unnathaandi ..
heart-ellaam padharudhu
usur unnayum ennayum sera solludhu

Penney adi penney
unnai imayaai kaapeney
thaeney sendheney dhinam
thaniyaai thavithaeney

yes yes yes cuse me
un luv give-u Â ...( Thiruttu Paya Pulla ..)
